      • createCar

        public java.lang.String createCar(java.lang.String id,
                                  java.lang.String make,
                                  java.lang.String model,
                                  java.lang.String driverName,
                                  int numPassengers,
                                  double bookingFee,
                                  java.lang.String refreshments)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Description: This method is used to create the Silver Service Car.
        Parameters:
        id - The registration number of the Silver Service Car.
        make - The make of the Silver Service Car.
        model - The model of the Silver Service Car.
        driverName - The driver name of the Silver Service Car.
        numPassengers - The passenger capacity of the Silver Service Car.
        bookingFee - The booking fee of the Silver Service Car.
        refreshments - The refreshments provided by the Silver Service Car.
        Returns:
        A string representing if the Silver Service Car is successfully created.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - The exceptions required.

      • book

        public java.lang.String book(java.lang.String firstName,
                             java.lang.String lastName,
                             DateTime required,
                             int numPassengers,
                             java.lang.String registrationNumber)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Description: This method creates the booking of the car chosen by the user.
        Parameters:
        firstName - The first name of the user booking the Car.
        lastName - The last name of the user booking the Car.
        required - The date that the user booked the Car.
        numPassengers - The number of passengers that the user booked the Car.
        registrationNumber - The registration number of the Car.
        Returns:
        A string representing if the Car was able to be booked.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - The exceptions required.

        type - The type of the car, standard or Silver Service.

                                        java.lang.String lastName,
                                        DateTime dateOfBooking,
                                        double kilometers)
        Description: This method completes a booking based on the name of the passenger and the booking date.
        Parameters:
        firstName - The first name of the user booking the Car.
        lastName - The last name of the user booking the Car.
        dateOfBooking - The date that the user booked the Car.
        kilometers - The distance travelled by the Car.
        Returns:
        A string representing if the booking was completed successfully.

      • completeBooking

        public java.lang.String completeBooking(java.lang.String firstName,
                                        java.lang.String lastName,
                                        java.lang.String registrationNumber,
                                        double kilometers)
        Description: This method completes a booking based on the name of the passenger and the registration number of the Car.
        Parameters:
        firstName - The first name of the user booking the Car.
        lastName - The last name of the user booking the Car.
        registrationNumber - The registration number of the Car the user travelled in.
        kilometers - The distance travelled by the Car.
        Returns:
        A string representing if the booking was completed successfully.
